scriptItem.label: Prepare separate aov paths
scriptItem.scriptCode: import importlib import py_ak_htoa_prepare_separate_aovs importlib.reload(py_ak_htoa_prepare_separate_aovs) py_ak_htoa_prepare_separate_aovs.main() print("py htoa separate aovs")

scriptItem.label: Create default aovs
scriptItem.scriptCode: import importlib import py_ak_houdini_create_aovs importlib.reload(py_ak_houdini_create_aovs) py_ak_houdini_create_aovs.main() print("py default aovs")

scriptItem.label: Create additional aovs
scriptItem.scriptCode: import importlib import py_ak_houdini_create_aovs importlib.reload(py_ak_houdini_create_aovs) py_ak_houdini_create_aovs.main(additional=True) print("py additional aovs")
